languages.text: "Я знал, что у вас горячая кровь, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Растопим же Фесмофориуса Великомученика!"

traits.locale_text: "Я знал, что у вас горячая кровь, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Растопим же Фесмофориуса Великомученика!"
traits.speaker: FW_Lawman

languages.text: "I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"
languages.original_text: "Я знал, что у вас горячая кровь, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Растопим же Фесмофориуса Великомученика!"

traits.locale_text: "I knew your blood runs hot, {mf|master|mistress}! Let us stoke up Great Martyr Phesmophorius! Who will be the first to go into the inferno, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}?"
"I knew your blood runs hot, {mf|master|mistress}! Let us stoke up Great Martyr Phesmophorius! Who will be the first to go into the inferno, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}?"
"I knew your blood runs hot, {mf|master|mistress}! Let us stoke up the Great Martyr Phesmophorius! Who is to be the first to go into the inferno, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}?"
"I knew your blood runs hot, {mf|master|mistress}! Let us stoke up the Great Martyr Phesmophorius! Who is to be the first to go into the inferno, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}?"
"I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius! Who is to be the first to go into the inferno?"
"I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"
"I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"

languages.text: “我就知道您早已热血沸腾，来自上界的大人！让我们点燃伟大的菲斯摩弗瑞斯吧！”
languages.original_text: "I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"

traits.locale_text: “我就知道您早已热血沸腾，来自上界的大人！让我们点燃伟大的菲斯摩弗瑞斯吧！”

languages.text: «¡Ya sabía yo que le hierve la sangre, Excelencia Celestial! ¡Avivemos las llamas de san Fesmoforio!».
languages.original_text: "I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya sabía yo que le hierve la sangre, Excelencia Celestial! ¡Avivemos las llamas de san Fesmoforio!».

languages.text: "İçinizde bu ateşin yandığını biliyordum Semavi Efendimiz! Yüce Pesmoforyus'u körükleyelim!"
languages.original_text: "I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"

traits.locale_text: "İçinizde bu ateşin yandığını biliyordum Semavi Efendimiz! Yüce Pesmoforyus'u körükleyelim!"

languages.text: 「天の閣下、あなたが血気盛んなことは知っていました！私たちに偉大なるフェスモフォリウスの火を強めさせてください！」
languages.original_text: "I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、あなたが血気盛んなことは知っていました！私たちに偉大なるフェスモフォリウスの火を強めさせてください！誰が最初に地獄に行くべきなのですか？」

languages.text: « Je savais bien que vous aviez le sang chaud, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Attisons sans délai les flammes du grand Phesmophorius ! »
languages.original_text: "I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"

traits.locale_text: « Je savais bien que vous aviez le sang chaud, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Attisons sans délai les flammes du grand Phesmophorius ! »

languages.text: "Ich wusste, Ihr seid heißblütig, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Fachen wir den großen Phesmophorius an!"
languages.original_text: "I knew your blood runs hot, Your Celestial Highness! Let us stoke up the great Phesmophorius!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, Ihr seid heißblütig, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Fachen wir den großen Phesmophorius an!"
